abstract: China Petrochemical, known as the Sinopec Group, agreed to buy 60 percent of AED Oil‘s Puffin and Talbot oil ventures in the Timor Sea for 600 million Australian dollars ($559 million), gaining production in Australia.
lead_paragraph: China Petrochemical, known as the Sinopec Group, agreed to buy 60 percent of AED Oil‘s Puffin and Talbot oil ventures in the Timor Sea for 600 million Australian dollars ($559 million), gaining production in Australia.

headline.main: Sinopec Inks $599 Million Deal for AED Assets
